title: The principles of Christian religion sumarily sett dovvne according to the word of God: together with a breife epittomie of the bodie of divinitie. By James Usher Bishop of Armaugh.
author: Ussher, James, 1581-1656.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed by R.B. for Geo. Badger, and are to bee sold at his shop, in St. Dunstans Church Yard, in Fleet-Street,
